channel.title: Models?
channel.description: hi, i was wondering. i have my own client and i need to know how people get the rs models straight from runescape? example the dragon body and claws. im sure nobody drew those. how do people get them? thnks

item.title: Models?
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

This section is for the current version of RS2 only, and perhaps for questions about older versions that aid in understanding the current version. Go to www.moparisthebest.com/smf

Read full topic

item.title: Models?
item.dc:creator: @PeterMan PeterMan
item.description:
@PeterMan wrote:

[quote=“Hidendra, post:1, topic:246011”]Global forum rules apply here as well. Read them, learn them.

1) Please make your topic title follows this. E.g. say you wanted to post a zamorak godsword model you made (haha original…) I would make the topic title Zamorak Godsword. Short and sweet, leave the long ass explanations for inside the topic.

2) This section is only for models usable with the RS2 Client.

3) Absolutely NO requests. Learn how to make the model yourself You won’t regret it!

4) Post your work and your work only. (Unless you have proof the original owner gave you permission to post it)

5) Original work only. Do not recolor an item and then release it, this does not only break this rule but it also breaks rule four, as it is stealing someone elses work (RECOLORING DOES NOT MAKE THE MODEL YOURS IN ANY WAY, SHAPE OR FORM)

Any suggestions/rants about these current rules may be posted in this thread.[/quote]

Notice, the “No requests” part.

Read full topic
